constexpr int kMaxAttempts = 3;
...

Status CallWithRetries(const std::function<Status()>& f) {
  int attempts = 0;
  while (true) {
    auto status = f();
    if (!IsRetriable(status) || attempts >= kMaxAttempts) {
      return status;
    }
    LOG(ERROR) << "The operation resulted in an error and will be retried: "
               << status.ToString();
    constexpr int delay = std::min(initial_delay_seconds << attempts, kMaximumBackoffSeconds);
    attempts++;
    sleep(delay);
  }
}
